channel.title: Need someoneto take me on as coding apprentice!
channel.description:
Hi my in game name is Chiz, i am sorta new to coding i hardley know anything (nothing tbh) And i was looking for someone that is kind/helpfull/tollerent to help me and take me as an apprentice if you like... I'm geussing to make it easy for yourself you will have to have MSN my MSN is beverly-.-@hotmail.co.uk or chiz-.-@hotmail.com
Please get in contact with beverly-.-@hotmail.co.uk atm
thanks, Chiz.[br][br][size=1] Would Help if you Replied on here first ;)
